# Solafon Platform

> Solafon is a platform for creating mini-apps and bots with a chat-based interface on Solana.

## Documentation

- [Introduction](docs/README.md): Platform overview, features, architecture
- [Quick Start](docs/getting-started/quick-start.md): Build your first bot in 5 minutes
- [Authentication](docs/getting-started/authentication.md): JWT and API Token auth systems
- [First App](docs/getting-started/first-app.md): Creating your first mini-app

## API Reference

- [API Overview](docs/api/overview.md): Base URL, response format, rate limits
- [Auth API](docs/api/auth.md): Email OTP, JWT tokens
- [Apps API](docs/api/apps.md): Mini-app CRUD operations
- [Messages API](docs/api/messages.md): Chat messaging system
- [Categories API](docs/api/categories.md): App categories (AI, Games, Trading, DeFi, etc.)
- [Profile API](docs/api/profile.md): User profiles and settings
- [Mana Points API](docs/api/mana.md): Internal currency system
- [Secret Login API](docs/api/secret.md): Virtual phone numbers for privacy

## Developer API (Bot API)

- [Developer API Overview](docs/developer-api/overview.md): Telegram-style Bot API
- [Bot Authentication](docs/developer-api/authentication.md): API token usage
- [Send Messages](docs/developer-api/send-message.md): POST /bot/sendMessage
- [Receive Messages](docs/developer-api/receive-messages.md): GET /bot/getUpdates (polling)
- [Webhooks](docs/developer-api/webhooks.md): Real-time message delivery
- [Bot Commands](docs/developer-api/commands.md): Define and manage bot commands

## Dev Studio

- [Dev Studio Overview](docs/dev-studio/overview.md): Chat-based app management
- [Creating Apps](docs/dev-studio/creating-apps.md): 6-step wizard
- [Managing Apps](docs/dev-studio/managing-apps.md): Edit, delete, configure
- [Commands Reference](docs/dev-studio/commands.md): All Dev Studio commands

## MCP Integration

- [MCP Server Setup](docs/mcp/setup.md): Connect AI assistants to Solafon
- [MCP Tools Reference](docs/mcp/tools.md): Available MCP tools
- [AI Development Guide](docs/mcp/ai-development.md): Building with AI assistants

## Code Examples

- [Node.js Polling Bot](docs/examples/node-polling.md)
- [Node.js Webhook Bot](docs/examples/node-webhook.md)
- [Python Polling Bot](docs/examples/python-polling.md)
- [Python Webhook Bot](docs/examples/python-webhook.md)
- [Go Webhook Bot](docs/examples/go-webhook.md)
- [AI Bot with OpenAI](docs/examples/ai-bot.md)

## Project Architecture

- [CLAUDE.md](CLAUDE.md): AI assistant context for the codebase
- [Project Structure](docs/architecture.md): Backend architecture and patterns
